titleStmt.title: The Catholikes supplication vnto the Kings Maiestie, for toleration of Catholike religion in England: with short notes or animaduersions in the margine. : Whereunto is annexed parallel-wise, a supplicatorie counterpoyse of the Protestants, vnto the same most excellent Maiestie. : Together with the reasons of both sides, for and against toleration of diuers religions..
titleStmt.author: Powel, Gabriel, 1576-1611.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for Edmund Weauer, and are to be solde at his shop, at the great North doore of Paules Church.,

notesStmt.note: Printer's device on t.p. (McK. 273); head-pieces, initials.
In this state, C₄v line 12 ends "and abroade."; D₃r line 5 has "consequence.".
Imperfect: stained, worn edges, with loss of some page numbers.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
